works.title: Braian Beats
works.description: This portfolio showcases the work of a talented beatmaker, demonstrating their ability to produce unique and innovative beats. With a variety of tracks ranging from classic hip hop to modern trap, the portfolio highlights the artist's versatility and their ability to create music that adapts to different styles and genres.

works.title: NLEI
works.description: Official platform of the Computer Engineering Degree Program, aimed at facilitating the management of resources, grades, information about the course, and the course calendar.

works.title: REEM Oticas
works.description: It is a university project for the creation of a website for an ophthalmology clinic, in which it is possible to schedule an appointment, shop for ophthalmology products, and a blog session with articles related to eye health.

works.title: Comida p'ra todos
works.description: Implementation of the front-end of the academic project Comida P'ra Todos, which aims to reduce food waste, since this waste exacerbates food insecurity, malnutrition and water use at a time when hunger in the world is increasing

works.title: Ani Mangalist
works.description: A web application to store data of animes (cartoons) and mangas (comics made in Japanese style) that are produced in japan.

works.title: Santo Coisas
works.description: An e-commerce for selling national products.
